articles.author: Tim MacMahon
articles.title: 'Fire Nico!' chants abound in Luka Doncic's return to Dallas - ESPN
articles.description: "Fire Nico!" chants directed at the Mavericks general manager who traded away generational superstar Luka Doncic to the Lakers echoed throughout American Airlines Center on Wednesday night in Doncic's return to Dallas.
articles.content: DALLAS -- After only 4 seconds of action in Luka Doncic's return to Dallas, the first chant broke out requesting the immediate termination of Mavericks general manager Nico Harrison, the man responsi… [+3404 chars]
